activities: Global video conferencing solution available in any country with core datacenter infrastructure running in the US. Types of data may include: login and email information, phone number, shared content, recorded video and audio conferences.

personaldata: Fuze use personal information that it receives from EU customers and business contacts primarily for (1) providing communication services to customers; (2) customer support activities, such as fulfilling product orders, providing technical support and improving product offerings; (3) sales and marketing activities as permissible under applicable law; (4) enabling and providing online product servi
recoursemech: If the complaint or dispute cannot be resolved through our internal process, and Fuzebox does not adequately respond to your question, please contact the San Francisco office of the JAMS International, which will serve as a liaison with Fuzebox to resolve your concerns.
